gist.summary: Updates the highlights announcement file to reflect recent model tier changes and infrastructure migrations.
gist.impact: Ensures the news pipeline has the latest information for community updates.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee updating a digital news ticker or billboard. Represents the internal update to the announcement system.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny bee character updating a pixelated digital news board. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny bee character updating a pixelated digital news board. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
